content.rendered:
Directed by K.K. Radhakrishna Kumar

Written by Abbas Dalal. Hussain Dalal. Madhan Karky. Jay Krishna. K.K. Radhakrishna Kumar

Star Prabhas (Vikramaditya). Pooja Hegde (Prerana). Bhagyashree Patwardhan (Girija Rani). Krishnamraju (Paramahamsa). Jagapathi Babu (Anand Rajput). Sachin Khedekar (Prerana’s Uncle). Priyadarshi (Subbarao). Flora Jacob (Indira Gandhi). Murli Sharma (Prerana’s father). Kunaal Roy Kapur (Vedant). Sathyan (Anand Rajput’s Assistant). Jayaram (The Ship Captain). Nabeel Mirajkar (David (as Nabeel Ahmed)). Sunil Beniwal (Somesh). Mahati Bhikshu (Veena). Sharik Khan (Prerana’s friend). Bikram Malati (Betal Singh). Hani Yadav (Narayan Goyal). Abhinay Raj Singh (Radhe Shyam Brother). Sasha Chettri (Nithya). Riddhi Kumar (Tara).Gaurav Pareek

Language Telugu

Producers Shiv Chanana. Ivano Fucci. Bhushan Kumar. V. Vamsi Krishna Reddy. S. Sandeep. Michele Saragoni. Pramod Uppalapati. Praseedha Uppalapati

Production Gopikrishna Movies. T-Series Films. UV Creations
